title: New Austrian Government Sworn In — Austria in USA
snippet: ... On March 3, 2025, Federal President Alexander Van der Bellen swore in a new Austrian Federal Government formed by the Austrian People’s Party (ÖVP), the Social Democratic Party (SPÖ) and the NEOS.

title: Chancellor of Austria - Wikipedia
snippet: The official residence and executive ... the cabinet are appointed by the president and can be dismissed by the president. The current officeholder is Christian Stocker, who was sworn in as chancellor on 3 March 2025 by President Alexander Van der Bellen....

title: Austrian far-right leader receives mandate to try to lead a government for the first time since World War II | PBS News
snippet: Left: FILE PHOTO: Austrian President Alexander Van der Bellen shakes hands with far-right Freedom Party (FPO) leader Herbert Kickl in Vienna, Austria, January 6, 2025.

title: Austria swears in centrist coalition without far right – DW – 03/03/2025
snippet: Timothy Jones with dpa and ... · Austria now has a three-way coalition government, sworn in by President Alexander Van der Bellen (2nd from R) Advertisement ·...

title: Austrian president tasks far-right leader with forming government | Politics News | Al Jazeera
snippet: Austrian President Alexander Van der Bellen, left, meets far-right Freedom Party leader Herbert Kickl in Vienna, January 6, 2025 [Leonhard Foeger/Reuters]
